titleStmt.title: Love given o're: or, A satyr against the pride, lust, and inconstancy, &c. of woman.
titleStmt.author: Brown, Thomas, 1663-1704.
Gould, Robert, d. 1709?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Bentley, and J. Tonson.,

notesStmt.note: Variously attributed to Robert Gould and Thomas Brown. cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
